storyline: Hey Welcome to the StickWorld and this is gonna be your new house now
You: Me? I cant even remember anything about myself...
Well you should be able to adapt with the condition here and you might be able to remember your past
You can only go to a place which is near your location by clicking the door
Go on check you house you may find something or direction
This is your new house and here you can find your money
You only have limited money which is $10
What you will get is differed by your stats
STR is for Health, AGI is for Movement speed, INT for Income
Q: You need to go to the office and work over there
This is the office, You may work over here and it cost your time outside
Your salary will be depends on your intelligent
Q: work for once by pressing the image button
Hey You have reached the your neighbour city
There is a food hall, weapon store, and gym training
Q: Go to food hall and buy small potion to see how things work

completed: You have completed the fist quest
you get 1 stats points for each attribute
Try to go to the next city by moving to the right
from your city until you reach the border or more
You were granted with 1 point stats
Next you need to go to gym to learn how to train and get more stats
Congratulations you have beaten the enemy
Next You need to go to weapon store where
you can buy your weapon to enhance your damage
Q: Go to Weapon store and buy a knife
You have bought completed the quest by buying a knife
You will be granted 1 overall stats
Next You need to fight the waves to go back
